1217950.name: Dr Dick Dong: Stripper Underworld
1217950.description:
Coming soon! X-MiGuPLAY presents a story rich Action RPG featuring the return of our Lap Dance sim! Play as Richard East, code name ... Dong, Dick Dong. Dig deep into the Stripper Underworld, build 'relationships' ;) with the dancers and investigate your predecessor's disappearance. Expose a crime syndicate that is the embodiment of human darkness. Navigate quests and manage relationships within your scene of operation.

More TBA as this game gets closer to launch. Expected to release by Q4 2020.

AVAILABLE NOW! Get the original LAP DANCE simulator from this holiday's slam-dunk:


For stuff from X-MiGu:
